All Classes

Class Description
AddFriendTask
The class AddFriendTask implements the adding of friend by a user.
GetFriendListTask
The class GetFriendListTask implements the retrieval of the friend list by the user.
GetScoreboardTask
The class GetScoreboardTask implements the retrieval of the scoreboard by an user.
GetScoreTask
The class GetScoreTask implements the retrieval by a user of his score.
LoginTask
The class LoginTask implements the login of a user.
LogoutTask
The class LogoutTask implements the logout of a user.
Mailman
The Mailman class is a runnable class ran by the QuizzleServer's thread whose job is to deliver the result of the operations to the client who requested them.
MatchListener
This class implements the UDP socket listener waiting to receive match invitations.
MatchTask
The MatchTask class implements the match between two users.
MatchWords
The MatchWords class implements the random retrieval of the specified number of words to be fed to two players during a match.
QuizzleClient
QuizzleClient is the client program of WordQuizzle.
QuizzleClientGUI
QuizzleClientGUI is the client program of WordQuizzle provided with a GUI.
QuizzleDatabase
As the class name suggests, this is the QuizzleServer's database.
QuizzleMail
This is the class used to model the response message to be sent to a QuizzleClient.
QuizzleServer
QuizzleServer is the core class of the Word Quizzle application.
QuizzleUser
The QuizzleUser class models a user and implements the comparable interface, sorting the users is necessary to build the scoreboard.
RegistrationRMI
Interface used for the remote method invocation.
TaskInterface
The TaskInterface provides utility methods for all the tasks.
